name: Circle of Spores
description: Druids of the Circle of Spores embrace decay and rebirth, wielding fungal power to damage foes and animate the dead.

2.name: Halo of Spores
2.description: You deal necrotic damage to creatures that start their turn near you.

2.name: Symbiotic Entity
2.description: You expend Wild Shape to gain temporary hit points and enhance your spores.

6.name: Fungal Infestation
6.description: You animate fallen creatures briefly as fungal zombies.

10.name: Spreading Spores
10.description: You create lingering clouds of damaging spores.

14.name: Fungal Body
14.description: You gain resistance to critical hits and immunity to several conditions.
